name: st-checkin-ios
description: App de Check-in ST Ingressos para iPhone

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html index.tsx App.tsx types.ts firebaseConfig.ts manifest.json metadata.json dist/ && cp -r components dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r hooks dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r utils dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
